lead_paragraph: FLASTER--Norma Summers, on April 27, 2016 at 88 years of age, after a long struggle with Parkinson's Disease. Beloved wife of Alvin, loving mother of Lynn Flaster Paul (John) and Richard. Adored grandmother of Scott Alvord (Sandra) and Julie Alvord. Great-grandmother of Eleanor and Thomas. Daughter of the late George and Sadie Summers. Sister of the late Allan Summers. She was charming, intelligent, beautiful, and had a great sense of style. We will miss and love her forever. Services 10:30am, Sunday, May 1, 2016 at Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY, (516) 487-9600. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FLASTER, NORMA SUMMERS
